name: Dungeons in Dice
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Mouse: Aim 

Left Click: Melee Attack

Space: Ability

Dungeons in Dice is a rogue-like where you have to clear the dice of any intruders.  Be careful, however, as these intruders are ... let's say, unforgiving.

The order of the rooms is random, at first.  Each time you die, you can make the game slightly more predictable. You do this by deciding where the room you died will show up again during your next run. So be strategic about which one goes where, as each room drops a unique ability that can be used in your next room. And in some rooms this ability might be useless, in others, it might just be absolutely broken.

Your goal is to ensure no enemies are left, meaning completing an entire run. Once all slots are filled, meaning you died 6 times, it's over! Good luck out there ... you'll need it.

PS. Download for best experience
